ComicInfo.Title: Bondage Palace, Part 4
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 17:23:36. [CVDB316302] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 23:57:47. [Issue ID 761888]
ComicInfo.Characters: The Blonde,Suen,Popess Crimelda,Sonya,General Prittwitt,Tatiana Kubinski,Olga Koslowska,Gary,Agent K-89,Nurse Uglyruth,Junior Prittwitt,Ethel Lorimar,Matilda X-15,Milly Gucciardone
ComicInfo.Summary: Bondage Palace, Part 4: Popess Crimelda steals the formula from The Blonde and takes it to a spa run by Milly Gucciardone in order to use it on herself. The Blonde and General Prittwitt square off, because The Blonde has memorized the formula. And the patients in Milly's spa engineer a revolt against her strict methods.
